inclusion.criterion: Must understand the risks and the benefits/purpose of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be 18 years at time of signing the informed consent form
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in all required evaluations and procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a diagnosis of DM based upon the characteristic cutaneous findings
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be candidate for systemic therapy for their DM skin disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If on immunosuppressive treatments and/or steroids, patients must be on stable doses for at least 4 weeks
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must undergo age appropriate cancer screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Females of childbearing potential (FCBP) must have a negative pregnancy test at screening
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Increasing or changing dose of topical therapy within 14 days of study day 0
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of any clinically significant (as determined by the investigators) cardiac, endocrinologic, pulmonary, neurologic, psychiatric, hepatic, renal, hematologic, immunologic, or other major uncontrolled disease
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome and obesity. She has developmental delay and short stature.
